sentences.en: "The Bodyguard" is a fairly bog-standard thriller.
sentences.cn: 《保镖》是一部毫无新意的惊险电影。

sentences.en: He beckoned a second bodyguard, Lou.
sentences.cn: 他招手把另一姓罗的保镖叫过来.

sentences.en: He keeps a bodyguard of ten men.
He obviously meant Jules, Lucy, Johnny Fontane and Michael's bodyguard, Albert Neri.
sentences.cn: 他显然指的是裘里斯 、 璐西 、 约翰呢-方檀和迈克尔的保镖亚伯特-奈里.
他的保镖立即采取行动.

sentences.en: I knew I was never in any danger with my stalwart bodyguard around me.
sentences.cn: 我知道有强壮的保镖在我的周围，我永远不会有什么危险。

sentences.en: She has to have an armed bodyguard wherever she goes.
sentences.cn: 她不管到哪儿都得有带武器的保镖跟从.

sentences.en: The big guy standing at his side may be his bodyguard.
sentences.cn: 站在他身旁的那个大个子可能是他的保镖.

sentences.en: The bodyguard outside the door stood up and saluted Thomson.
sentences.cn: 门外的卫兵立正向汤姆森敬了礼.

sentences.en: The King had brought his own bodyguard of twenty armed men.
sentences.cn: 国王带了20名持枪的贴身侍卫。

sentences.en: The Premier's bodyguard was [ were ] waiting there.
sentences.cn: 首相的 护卫 人员在那儿等着.

sentences.en: The President arrived, followed by his personal bodyguard.
sentences.cn: 总统来了，随行的是他的私人保镖。

sentences.en: The President's bodyguard is / are armed.
sentences.cn: 总统的侍卫佩带着武器.

sentences.en: The Queen's bodyguard is 〔 are 〕 standing at the entrance.
sentences.cn: 女王的卫队站立在入口处.

sentences.en: The senator arrived, surrounded by personal bodyguards.
sentences.cn: 这位参议员在私人保镖的簇拥下抵达。

sentences.en: Walden noticed the bodyguard scanning the woods on either side.
sentences.cn: 沃尔登注意到他们的警卫不停地扫视着两边的小树林.

trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to protect an important person
